message: I am a self-taught guitarist that has been playing for 6 years now. It is very heartwarming to see a beginner giving it their all to learn guitar. Hebimori's chord switching in the air, playing outside, learning those chords are very very endearing to watch. I gave up once, because I was not improving. However, after a few months, I found a good YouTube channel which helped me improve and then reignited my passion for guitar. It is great to see that Hebimori had friends that gave good advice which helped her continue learning the instrument. 10/10 great episode.
She's acting more like Chitanda here.
